about_the_game:
Taiwan Love Story⁵ - Digital Artbook: Character Introductions, H-Scenes with Variations, Memorable Dialogues, Initial Character Designs, Background Art, and Cover Art Creation Process.

The digital artbook for "Taiwan Love Story⁵" features an extensive collection of character illustrations, sketches, and scene artwork from the game, along with early character concepts that did not make it into the final release.

Content Highlights:

Character Introductions: Comprehensive profiles and background information for all the characters featured in the game.

Memorable Dialogues: A nostalgic look back at some of the most memorable and impactful dialogues from the game.

Initial Character Designs: Early concept art and designs that showcase the development process of the characters before their final iterations.

Background Art: Immersive and intricate artwork depicting the captivating world and environments of the game.

Cover Art Creation Process: An in-depth look into the creative process behind designing the captivating cover art for the game.

content_descriptors.notes: All character depicted are over the age of 20. Contains exposed and footjob.
